A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm only giving this one start because RT doesn't count half or no stars. spoilers Hux was emasculated\, Luke was corrupted\, Finn was cheated\, Poe was made into an idiot\, Leia was wasted\, Snoke was mishandled\, Phasma was called 'chrome-dome' before her being cast aside\, Chewie was turned into a stage prop\, BB8 was turned into a super hero\, Rey was cheapened into a nothing-character... the only character whose story mattered in this one was Kylo. Let's not forget the disaster that was Canto Bight\, Rose\, and purple hair. I hope JJ sums up TLJ in the opening crawl for episode 9 so that fans feel free to skip 8 altogether in a rewatch marathon. And Rian Johnson\, your Star Wars movie sucks.
